original: 軍閥籌組的私兵，配備刀盾，能吸引敵人。未被兵種克制，移動較慢、攻擊力較低，和盜匪均以財物為目標，但戰力強大，不可輕忽。
text: Private soldiers organized by warlords, equipped with swords and shields, can attract the enemy. Not restrained by arms, slower movement, lower attack power, and bandits all target property, but their combat power is strong and cannot be ignored.
